dialogue.text: User Request: "Create an app that asks the user for an integer and then displays that number times 2."

User Request: "I tried to add a toolbar but now my build is failing. Please fix it."

TOOL_RESULT:
ToolResult(success=false, message="Build failed.", data=
  "> Task :app:compileDebugKotlin FAILED\n  e: /path/to/project/app/src/main/java/com/example/app/MainActivity.kt: (20, 25): Unresolved reference: toolbar\n")

User Request: "The app crashes when I try to open it with a ClassNotFoundException. Please fix it."

TOOL_RESULT:
ToolResult(success=false, message="App crashed on launch.", data=
  "FATAL EXCEPTION: main\n  java.lang.RuntimeException: Unable to instantiate activity ComponentInfo{...MainActivity}:\n  java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Didn't find class \"...MainActivity\"\n")

User Request: "Please add the dependency 'androidx.core:core-ktx:1.9.0' to the app."

TOOL_RESULT:
ToolResult(success=false, message="Invalid dependency format: 'implementation(\"androidx.core:core-ktx:1.9.0\")'", data=null, error_details=null)
